ratings.comment: Great guy. Course is a little back loaded for a 2 credit class, but he genuinely cares about his students. Put in a little effort, send him some drafts of your papers and you can get an A. This is not a slack off class, but it is worth the effort I put into it.
Professor Johnson was extremely helpful and if you put in some effort this class is an easy A. He is willing to look over papers before you turn them in and grades very fairly.

If you put effort into Mr. Johnson's class you will get an A. He is a nice and willing to work with you to improve your writing. He was always willing to chat and help students out. It was a wonderful class for a first semester freshman.

The class gives a good load for only 2 credits, but if you stay ahead of it and put some effort into your essays it should be an easy A.  Professor Johnson is very helpful and keeps the class quite interesting. He's a fair grader and one of the best professors ive had.

The class starts out with a good amount of work, with writing assignments after each class. After mid-semester, the daily assignments end.  Lecture is more like a discussion, and somewhat random.  To get a good grade, simply attend the classes and have honest reflections.  I did actually improve my writing skills because of the class as well.

Do not be late for class. It will hurt your grade a lot. His discussions in class are boring and weird but the assignments are easy and you can choose whatever you want for all of them so they can be interesting. His grading scale blows. Easy to get a B or AB, impossible to get an A.

He is sort of a weird guy.  Knows everything about everything because he reads so much.  He told me to add Gregor Mendel in my genetic technical report and I researched it and was the only person in the class writting about it.  Pretty easy grader, attend class all the time or else he wont like you.

Good professor. Many smaller writing assignments instead of a few larger ones. Not overly critical of writing, very fair grading. Very interested in new technology and  social impacts. Only complaint is that he is sometimes unclear on assignment requirements and deadlines. I definitely recommend taking 397 with Prof Johnson.

Though he seemed well read and interested in the class, he never made assignments very clear as to when they were due, the syllabus would contradict, and he often claimed to have never got my assignments when i emailed them, counting them as late. Not too hard of a class if you can handle writing papers. I honestly don't recall learning anything, o

This professor is awesome!  He give you plenty of feedback on papers written and his grading scale is fair.  If you put forth effort, you will do well in his course.  He kept the class interesting and seemed to care about his students.  Highly recommended.

Johnson is a well spoken fair Professor.  His grading is by far the most fair I've seen by an English Engineering Professor.  Extremely nice guy and always willing to help.  Would recommend to anyone and everybody.

The professor is very fair, offers plenty of feedback and shows alot of enthusiasm. He teaches the 3 C's and practices it in his teaching. Above and foremost, he's very intelligent and knowledgeable in the subjects he teaches which makes him very enjoyable to listen to and have discussions with. I have recommended him to many friends.

Never clear on what he wanted handed in,or what he wanted you to do.  Most of class time was wasted with him and two other kids disscussing articles.  Not a lot of teaching.  His grading scale was steep too.  Above a 90 to get and AB. Definetly wouldn't recommed him for a friend.

Very fun professor.  Class discussions are very interesting and papers were easy to write.  He lets you send your papers to him to check over before you hand them in.  Grades fairly and it is easy to get an AB or A if you put a little effort in (which is usually to write a couple of short responses each week).

He was very helpful when writing papers, letting you email him and he'd check them over before you have to submeit them.  I'm pretty sure his a little crazy though, making us do yoga and pushups in class.

The class was mainly all about discussion.  There is a lot of pointless lecture discussions and lecture material.  A lot of pointless reading that is assigned.  Kind of a crazy guy sometimes, gets really into modern technology.
Lots of busy work, but overall a very easy A.  Prof. Johnson will review all of your papers before you submit them; this is very helpful so take advantage.

Extremely helpful professor, would highly recommend to anyone!  There is a lot of busy work in the beginning of the class, but that is the nature of epd 155.  Very good professor--makes the class extremely interesting!

Class was somewhat intresting but He was not the best professor. He was extremely unclear about when assignments are due and has a harsh grading scale. He was also not very helpful one on one. Over all i would not suggest him to a friend.
Great teacher.  He's really helpful and keeps the class somewhat interesting.  He gave more homework than I expected, but it's still a pretty easy A.

One of those profs that deserves to teach at UW.  He is willing to help you do well if you are willing to put the time in and show interest.  Topics he chooses are great for engineers and he knows everything about them so research.  If you show effort he will reward you.  If you are not a great scientific writer, he will work with you personally.
dry sense of humour some like, some  don't.
I love this guy, he cares a lot about the subjects he discusses in class and will go over you papers before you hand them in. It's basically a fool proof A if you use him as a resource.
Very easy teacher, but very good too.  Very helpful in editing papers so that you do well.  Just show up.

He is a little ego centric and likes the sound of his own voice but his work isn't challengin so I don't complain about listening to long winded diatribes if it gets me an A.  The key to the class is not to speak up to much and not to be too quiet.

He helps you a lot if you ask for it and even if you dont.  On my second paper, he reviewed it 4 times before I turned it in! I haven't had a teacher who would do that for me. He knows a lot about the topics you write about so you have to research.  Very good teacher, but the class itself is boring.

This is an easy class by far.  A few papers with the last one being a research paper and a class presentation. Mr. J was alright, but I thought I was back in high school again. ex: he gave an extra pt. to the person who did the 1st presentation. yeah!
